member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Upgrades your test projects that are using MSTest, NUnit, or xUnit.net from VSTest to Microsoft.Testing.Platform..

member.name: T:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Mtp.Transformers.Package.MtpProjectPackagesTransformer
member.summary: Changes project properties to support Microsoft.Testing.Platform.
Update package and report true when change was done. The extension apis on project don't have version comparison and report true even if add package with the version that is already there.

member.name: M:Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Mtp.Transformers.Package.MtpProjectPackagesTransformer.RemovePackage(Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Services.IProject,Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Operations.OperationContext,Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Mtp.MtpContext,System.String,Microsoft.UpgradeAssistant.Services.ILogger)
member.summary: Remove package and report true when change was done. The extension apis on project don't check if the package was there or not.
